content: Just wanted to say @RalfJ, great job with the issues for validity invariants. At least on the few I clicked on thus far, you really did a good job identifying the interesting questions right off the bat =)

thanks :)
I spent quite some time thinking about these things already.^^ my biggest worry was framing things too much into my thoughts, I want a discussion and not just dump my world view onto all of you. let's see how that goes.
